author: francek
title: Web 3.0 user profile (web avatar)
description: 应允许网络用户创建、编辑和控制他们自己的用户资料。为什么要在不同的网站上创建相同的用户资料？

f6_assessments.q0:
The idea of this proposal is right , however i feel it still needs a lot of work an maybe the proposer would benefit from gathering a team of people or collaborating with other groups to help develop this idea. Developing is one aspect but getting this to market and being accepted is another.
There is also a fundamental issue with the funding request , funds requested = $50k but in the body of the proposal there is a section for a $20k fund request.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has done good job in laying out the developments plans but this proposal would benefit massively from a equally well written 'go to market' plan.
I would encourage the developer to look at partnerships, start a prototype and bring back a demo in a future fund.
f6_assessments.q2: The definitions of success look sensible but as mentioned above there is no real confidence that this will ever be more than a desktop exercise and get into the real world. if the proposer can provide confidence that there is a solid plan to achieve this then it will definitely become a proposal worth looking at for funding approval.

f6_assessments.q0: A signal master profile has potential to greatly improve user experience when signing up to new sites or services. Having this based on Cardano could lead to future integration with payment services like ADA pay, or simply bring users to the Cardano ecosystem making Cardano based dApps and DeFi their default choice. KPIs are relevant but loosely defined. KPIs are exclusively for targets after a working app is ready, no KPIs or milestones given for app development.
f6_assessments.q1: Budget breakdown does not match amount requested ($20k breakdown vs $50k requested).  Proposer appears to be suitably experienced to develop this app. Appears to only be plan for a single developer, given project timescale of a year this seems feasible however budget of $20k seems low for 1 year of effort. Plan for delivery is vague, and possibly over optimistic.
f6_assessments.q2: Few milestones related to product development. Some KPIs for product launch success but loosely quantified. Budget breakdown does not match request so it's unclear what the remaining $30k is intended to be used for or how its use would be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is in line with the proposed challenge, both its problem and solution present the use of ATALA Prism to attempt users who browse the internet and are tired of logging in or updating their data on multiple sites simultaneously, with this we have a unique solution for registration and record of data for users, but the success metrics are not clear and can be separated by "Adoption", "Growth" and finally "Engagement" this way we can monitor the performance of the solution throughout its life.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer just attached the CV on a PDF file with some vague and not correlated jobs with blockchains or user id management . My suggestion for a future proposal is to add more information so that the voters are able to validate the experience.
Needs more information on how many people will work on the project, this was not clear in the proposal, it seems to be just one person. 
The budget break was made simplistic and seems not to be a good distribution.
f6_assessments.q2: Roadmap and milestones (incl. time horizon) are weakly described, no metrics to follow the development,  the division and development are broken in months having as success a shallow vision about what will be achieved, it can be put like this "Successful implementation in 3 possible clients", "Apply the solution in a big company", my tip is to break the deliverables from macro to micro, so that voters can understand what will be developed in a clear and objective way.

f6_assessments.q0: What better way to create mass decentralized identity (DID) adoption than enabling users of the internet across the globe (4.88 billion people according to google) to gain control of their identity online? Just the existence of this tool would create an exposure to ATALA PRISM that could increase awareness of the program in a comprehensible, highly functional use case. Any plans to scale this proposal after the initial 12 months?
f6_assessments.q1: Proposer's experience alone will no doubt suffice in ensuring the proposal will be implemented successfully. Though, building a development team may help this proposal excel and reach it's full potential. Apologies if the proposer planned on building a team but just didn't mention in the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Roadmap and proposed budget information seem sound. Potential improvement, which types of websites will be targeted in the first three months? Social platforms, health provider websites,

solution: 描述你自己的DID。只要你愿意，可以提供尽可能多的数据和媒体。控制你将向哪些网站提供什么数据。
experience: 我在全栈网络开发方面有7年的专业经验。我曾开发并科学地研究过语义网项目。
